message:
Hi all, I'm looking to create a job posting for a local programmer in Toronto. I wanted to utilize HackerNews if possible. This person would take on the roles of taking an existing app and working with the expansion of this app. 

PHP, MySQL, JAVA and Javascript are a requirement but knowledge of new, more scale-able technologies would be a plus. The pay structure is negotiable - base pay or equity can be an option for experienced programmers. Contracting is also available for newer or inexperienced programmers. The company works within a group of companies so you may be sourced to other divisions.
post in the monthly Who's Hiring Post. http://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=2949787
